info.en:
Service configuration
Location of nodes
Mumbai, India
Configuration of Servers

BP

as Block Producer, only 1 Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instance will be running the main BP for the duration of the first election. 

  Nodes 1x EC2 (x1.32xlarge) 
  vCPUs 128 Cores 
  Memory 2TB RAM 
  Storage (IPFS) 2 x 1920GB (SSD) 
  Network 25 Gigabit 

BP

as Block Producer, two Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances will be running as full EOS nodes. In the event of a failure of the main BP node, the secondary BP node will act as a backup and will become the main node. Minimal downtime shall be the main priority in case of a full node failure. 

  Nodes 2x EC2 (x1.32xlarge) 
  vCPUs 128 Cores 
  Memory 2TB RAM 
  Storage (ipfs) 2 x 1920GB (SSD) 
   Network 25 Gigabit

Group Introduction
EOS India has great knowledge of technologies, strategies and business.
Find us on:
Twitter
https://twitter.
info.zh_CN:
节点位置
Mumbai, India
服务器配置
如果EOS India成为BP，则在第一次选举期间，只有一个弹性计算云（EC2）实例将运行主要BP。

节点1x EC2（x1.32xlarge）

vCPU 128内核

内存2TB RAM

存储（IPFS）2 x 1920GB（SSD）

网络25千兆

BP“选举”：

如果EOS印度被选为Block Producer，则两个Elastic Compute Cloud（EC2）实例将作为完整的EOS节点运行。在主要BP节点发生故障的情况下，辅助BP节点将充当备份并且将成为主节点。在全节点故障的情况下，最小停机时间应是主要优先事项。

节点2x EC2（x1.32xlarge）

vCPU 128内核

内存2TB RAM

存储（ipfs）2 x 1920GB（SSD）

网络25千兆
团队介绍
EOS India我们的团队汇集了来自各领域领先组织的技术、战略和业务方向的专业知识。
